subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The longtime K.H.L. star Maxim Sushinsky scored twice to help SKA St. Petersburg beat the Carolina Hurricanes in the first game played on Russian soil by an N.H.L. club in 20 years.
snippet: The longtime K.H.L. star Maxim Sushinsky scored twice to help SKA St. Petersburg beat the Carolina Hurricanes in the first game played on Russian soil by an N.H.L. club in 20 years.
